scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:functions && npm run deploy:scheduler
scripts.deploy:functions: gcloud functions deploy data-ingestion --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy glassnode-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy coinglass-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy fred-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy binance-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy x-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy coinmarketcap-fetcher --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated && gcloud functions deploy historical-data --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy:scheduler: gcloud scheduler jobs create http data-ingestion-scheduler --schedule="*/5 * * * *" --uri="$(gcloud functions describe data-ingestion --format='value(httpsTrigger.url)')" --http-method=POST
scripts.remove: gcloud functions delete data-ingestion --quiet && gcloud functions delete glassnode-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete coinglass-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete fred-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete binance-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete x-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete coinmarketcap-fetcher --quiet && gcloud functions delete historical-data --quiet && gcloud scheduler jobs delete data-ingestion-scheduler --quiet
